attributes.additional_details:
There are too many bus lanes clogging up the cities and towns, while some are located near public transpot hubs which are useful, many are in locations which are not an efficient use of the road system, causing traffic jams and complicated traffic management systems.

Removing little used bus lanes would povide a boost to the economy, allowing shorter journey time, enabling more buisness.

This petition calls for the review of non necessary bus lanes.
